title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message:
A friend asked me about a 2012 mbp he just bought. 
It boots when he plug in magsafe but the powerbutton have no function. The keyboard is working fine. 
He's gonna send it to me. 
Is it something on the board that can cause the powerbutton to stop working?

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: Did you try to short smc_onoff_l to ground?

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: I dont have the mbp yet. It arrives next week

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: First try this And reporte back if it works this way.

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: Guess liquid damage keyboard. tray new keyboard

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: Strange if liquid only destroys powerbutton

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: Not strange at all. Incredibly common on this model. 99% chance it's the keyboard, replace and be happy.

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message:
Got the computer today.
I have tried three known good keyboards but no powerbutton fuction.
Shorting SMC_ONOFF_L to ground dosent change anything

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: What is the voltage on C5710? SMC_LID high?

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message:
C5710 is 3.42 volt 
meassured SMC_LID at R6961 and it is 3.45 volt. 
But now when the logic board is removed from the case the powerbutton works with only keyboard and battery plugged in.

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: That is because if you plug in the battery indicator it pulls down SMC_LID. Check again with BIL connected.

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: yes that is correct. doesnt work with indicator connected

title: 820-3115 powerbutton
message: Still need to install a new keyboard, bowerbutton doesnt work on the one that is installed....... 15 minutes work!!
